root.name: Continent of the Ninth Seal
root.description: System RequirementsMinimumOS: Window XP Processor: AMD Athlon XP 2400+, Intel Single Core 2.4GHz Memory: 512MB MB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon 9800, Geforce 6600 Series DirectX®: 9.0c Hard Drive: 4 GB HD spaceRecommendedOS: Window XP Processor: AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, Intel Duel Core 3.0GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD1900, Geforce 8000 Series DirectX®: 9.0c Hard Drive: 4 GB HD space
